request.description:
## **This is signup api for gramlok.**

### Request Body:

1).userName=>string

2).userId=>string(must be email or phone number)

3).password=>string

4).confirmPassword=>string(password and confirmPassword must be string)

5).gender=> string(Male or Female or Other)

6).dob=>date(ex:YYYY-MM-DD)

## This is signin api for gramlok.

**Request Body:**

1).userId=>string(email or phone number)

2).password=>string

response.name: SuccessResponse

request.description:
## This is Forgot Password api for gramlok

**Request Body:**

userId=>string(Email or Phone number)

response.name: SuccessResponse

request.description:
IMPORTANT NOTES:

in front end, when we called api , in request body auth is not required. it automattically give by backend. when we test api in postman. we must put auth object.

**Request:**

1).oldPassword=>string(must be old password)

2).password=>string

3).confirmPassword=>string(must be same password and confirm password)

4).uuid=>string(user unique id)

Headers=>Authorization=>bearer token=>Put your token

this user_status api is return current user data.

**Request:**

Headers=>Authorization=>bearer token=>Put your token

response.name: SuccessResponse
SuccessResponse

request.description:
eType=VILLAGE or SUBDISTRICT or DISTRICT

pType=SERVICE_WANTED_POST or SERVICE_PROVIDING_POST

entityCode=code for your entity

categories=\[\]

give category ids in array
